website_summaries.verdict: While not super durable, this affordable, lightweight coat offers good warmth and protection from the wind.
pros: Made from 100% polyester with fleece lining
dries quickly if water does get in
Elastic at cuff and hem to keep heat in and wind out
Two outer pockets and two inner pockets
cons: Some complaints of zipper or stitching failing after a year

website_summaries.verdict: A budget-friendly men's snowboarding jacket that is thick, comfortable and warm.
pros: Removable hood enables you to protect your head as needed
Includes 2 outer pockets to help you keep your hands warm and 2 inner pockets to hold your keys, cell phone and other small items
Polyester construction guarantees exceptional strength and durability
cons: Jacket may be too big for some snowboarders

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2 and got large because I wanted it to be longer and to swallow me. I look like a walking jacket. It is definitely bigger than me but that's exactly what I wanted. It keeps my entire small body warm. This jacket is fantastic. It is so freaking warm and instantly blocks out the cold. The only thing that I do not like is the Hoodie. It is so small it doesn't stay on my head. Oh and the velcro on the Hoodie keeps snatching my hair! Everything else is great the inner pockets are nice and I just love this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Pretentious much!?
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely amazing, very heavy winter parka with one glaring problem.....who in the marketting department decided to place 4 logos on this coat and in two different styles. 2/4 say "Outdoor" while the other 2 say "Outdoor Jacket" bery very strange indeed. If you can look past this and the very odd fake zippered front pocket then this is a great Parka!
customer_reviews.author: Captain Ron the DJ

customer_reviews.title: Good value -pay attention to sizing
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how you can go wrong with this at this price. It's well made. I don't see the need for the faux front chest zipper, but beyond that I like it. It will be warm - quite a bit of insulation in the sleeves. I ordered an 8xl, which is roughly equivalent to a L from a company like Columbia. I have a bit of room for more layers. I'll waterproof it, even if it's repellant. Durability is unknown, but it seems very well made.
customer_reviews.author: herne

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket! After reading reviews I decided on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket! After reading reviews I decided on a 4XL, and it fits perfectly. I am 6 foot and 155 pounds, slimish build and normally wear a medium to large in coats and shirts (depending on brand).Jacket is very warm, light weight, not overly bulky,and has enough pockets...although as others have stated, the chest zipper is for show and not a pocket (could have, should have been a real pocket!), Have not tested it in heavy rain for waterproofness yet. Overall so far...very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Love this coat
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this jacket! Live in Michigan and perfect coat for everyday winter use. Very warm and appears to be good quality, especially for the price! Will update review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferZ

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The jacket looks really great and even tested it in 20 degree weather and was snuggly. Will do an updated version of it in 1 or 2 weeks. The reason why I'm giving it a 3 star is because I would like to see this product made in the USA because let's face it made in China product are well known to fall apart a few days later. 😳
customer_reviews.author: Robert Varde

customer_reviews.title: I like it well enough
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a xl to 2xl. I got a 2xl in this coat. It is just a little big. But it will work better with bulky sweaters in the winter. Very soft lining and seems like it will be fairly warm. I like the jacket. Not sure why anyone would put a non functioning pocket on it though. And the name is on it a couple times instead of just once like a regular coat, but I guess that's ok.
customer_reviews.author: stacey t.

customer_reviews.title: Love the jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love the jacket. It fits like a glove. Not at all tight plenty of room for heavier clothing and in no way binding. Wish I had found it sooner, with winter almost over will have to wait several months before I can really see how it keeps the cold out, Otherwise very happy. Ken Richards
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Richards

customer_reviews.title: Good jacket for snow and cold days
customer_reviews.text: I had originally bought the 5xl because im a medium size but then i returned it and got the 4xl because it was a better fit for a size medium. The 4xl was for a 39 inch chest and it fit nice and it was better in length than the 5xl because it was just it bit longer. But overall the jacket is really nice and warm. I took it out to the snow and kept me warm the whole time. It also feels and looks like good quality material. It is also pretty light and dosent feel bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Joao

customer_reviews.title: terrible zippers
customer_reviews.text: The zipper of this jacket are terrible. I have had a couple times when it jammed and I was scared I would have to cut the jacket off my body. Thankfully repeated fiddling worked. It might not in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jacket
customer_reviews.text: I have searched for a jacket like this for the past couple of days. It took me a while for me to find me the right one. The size I don't care for much, it's all about the style. It also has to include a right materials as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Le

customer_reviews.title: Super warm great in bad weather and cold temps rain, snow etc.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift to my husband he liked this very much super warm with the fur on the chest back and hood and weighted. He didn't like the neck where u can make it cover your whole neck (picky) and the wrist adjustment but hes a picky guy
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Horace

customer_reviews.title: It's a fairly good jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket with a really good discount during cyber Monday and I think I paid enough for it. It's a fairly good and nice jacket, I only give it a 4 star review because it is somewhat larger than I expected. Doesn't come packaged as the photo but mine came in a good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. It ws not folded. It was wrinckled. It was Small. I ordered an 4XL. I am returning the coat. I would not recommend this product. Returning it to buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Mica

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket, just not my size.
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a size 50 coat and I got the 9xxxl, which is the XXL in US sizes. It was way too big. I could have gone with the size down. It was way too long in the arms and too big around the shoulders. Other than that, this is a great looking jacket and was super warm. I did return it and the company was great to deal with. I will say order a size down as this runs large, it says it runs small but I disagree.
customer_reviews.author: John Stroup

customer_reviews.title: Just do it
customer_reviews.text: If fits like it's supposed to, and I'm very impressed with it. I was on the fence about what jacket to get and I'm glad I made this purchase. It even came in a duffel bag. Very warm jacket for work
customer_reviews.author: Dequan

customer_reviews.title: Great coat very warm+!
customer_reviews.text: The coat is great, I was really worried because of the price was so inexpensive, looks nice and it is wonderful, very warm, well made!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ann Sanborn

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket for both the price
customer_reviews.text: Everything in the description is true specially wind proof this winter in Colorado we have very cold and windy season and with this jacket didn't feel a thing but it gas big problem siper is cheap bad made bottom of siper never seals may be that's wy they put a botton on the bottom other then that great jacket for the price
customer_reviews.author: ricardo aguilar

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. But this jacket has a strong smell on it. And you can't wash it off... Update: Change to one star. Don't buy this. The smell is giving me headache. Planning to throw this away.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother with this coat.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this coat as soon as we unpackaged it. Fast forward after being worn twice: the zipper broke! Completely unwearable now. Sending back for a refund. What a shame. The coat was very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket for my husband who had to go to Norway for business. He loves it. It fit him perfectly and he could wear it in the rain. The hood came in handy too. I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jacket!!!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and super warm- great for fun in the snow/snowmobiling/skiiing
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it and it looks amazing on him! Super warm he says. We are in Texas going to Tennessee in a few weeks... hubby said “why do I only have to wear this where it snows?” “It’s perfect”
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey1808

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately, I do have a larger one for that
customer_reviews.text: It fits tight. There is no room for layering. Fortunately, I do have a larger one for that. This one looks nice; so, I am wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Gramps Hassinger

customer_reviews.title: A little big and thick
customer_reviews.text: It fits a little bit big but that's not exactly a bad thing when you're looking for warmth. Unfortunately it means your mobility becomes limited so not the best if you're looking to be more active. I'd recommend trying out the right sizes and checking the sizing chart.
customer_reviews.author: Castillos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome coat for price
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this coat! Good quality, stylish and backed by warranty. May buy again!!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is way off
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 2x ordered at 3x to have some room and it fit like a large. I returned it and ordered a 6x and it fits a little snug. The only reason I gave it 2 stars is because the quality is really good
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: A winters coat
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this purchase. The fit is good and it's very warm and it looks good on. I am confident that it will last thru the cold New England winters.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Grona

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat this jacket
customer_reviews.text: The best jacket i have ever had. Well worth the money plus it was a deal! Very warm and the wind cant break thru the coat so windy wheather is no bother in the cold! Glad i got it was a great investment i will be reccomending this to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Super warm
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing coat for the price super warm for my son he is 5’5 140 and I got him a M it’s a little big but he is only 11 so room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: JenniO

customer_reviews.title: not to size and over all poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The item took longer than most to arrive. It arrive in a size much smaller than stated even by EU and Asian size standards. The workmanship and quality was very poor and had a seam separation before it was even unboxed. I will never order another product from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Beerbower

customer_reviews.title: Great coat but not durable
customer_reviews.text: This coat's zipper broke the first time it was worn. Great price great coat but zipper should not have broken
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Zipper failed to zip on first use. Price to high for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: Good Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Good winter jacket that keep me warm and stood up well to punishment as I through my self down a mountain "snowboarding". Also, dries fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Warm, good weight winter coat
customer_reviews.text: Follow the guide. I ordered a 4XL to fit my medium son. It fits. Warm, faux front pocket, not a big deal. Good jacket for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Gator

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his jacket. Fits good & keeps him warm
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Wharton

customer_reviews.title: Zipper fails after 1st use.  Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: This product zipper failed on the first time skiing. Low quality and not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: D. DiMarzio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome coat
customer_reviews.text: Very warm coat, my son even sweats sometimes. Good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Debedee

customer_reviews.title: looks great. Just watch out for the sizes
customer_reviews.text: feels very quality, looks great. Just watch out for the sizes. Make sure you read the conversions!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but lining is purple.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is really nicely made, and very warm. However the inside lining, is a purple color. I bought this for my 17 year old son. He will not wear it because it’s purple. So it is now mine. I love it. But beware that the inside isn’t black.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Mortis

customer_reviews.title: Hide from wife
customer_reviews.text: So warm and comfortable my wife stole it from me
customer_reviews.author: Fred puls

customer_reviews.title: The best winter coat
customer_reviews.text: Very warm and great construction. A great coat. It is very warm in the cold, but breathes well so not too hot if it warms up.
customer_reviews.author: Quin Tencenshel

customer_reviews.title: Photos do not do it justice
customer_reviews.text: Way nicer than the photo. Soft and warm inside. Purchased two for guests that had never been skiing short notice.
customer_reviews.author: Zeon Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Runs just a smidge larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very warm and comfortable. Seemed a little roomy, but not overly large. Perfect if you’re gonna layer under it. Very soft interior, and the removable hood is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cold, very cold winter
customer_reviews.text: Its really warm and wind proof and pefect fiting to me.
customer_reviews.author: Milan kc

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: ordered 7x. this thing isn't even close. I would guess its a large at best. would never buy again, zippers fell of as well. I gave coat to my 12 year old, fits him. but like I said zippers broke right away. junk product
customer_reviews.author: Joshua beaulieu

customer_reviews.title: It is nice and very warm and the most important a very ...
customer_reviews.text: It is nice and very warm and the most important a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Marka

customer_reviews.title: Ran way too big and zipper is on wrong side
customer_reviews.text: Main zipper is too small and will surely fail sooner than later. And zipper is on the wrong side! I have to reverse my hands to use it compared to every other jacket I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Brescia

customer_reviews.title: Check Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I love the jacket, it is extremely warm and comfortable. I ordered a 4X and it fits like a women's medium.
customer_reviews.author: Toni G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it, he'll be using it this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: My dad Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dad is 65 years old and he loves it. He says is super soft and keeps him warm.
customer_reviews.author: Na-Dizzle

customer_reviews.title: Mom of 3
customer_reviews.text: My dad, brother, and son all love this coat. It's warm, soft to the interior touch and lots of pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3+1

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket just if you have big shoulders get one size bigger.
customer_reviews.text: It fits good it's just when I reach up or forward especially if I'm turning the wheel when driving I feel I'm gonna rip it. But besides that it's a great jacket. Keep in mind big shoulders run in my family, So if you have wide shoulders you should get one size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Provides warmth
customer_reviews.text: It provided warmth and protection from the cold. The shoulders fit well. The mid section area was a bit large. The drawstring at the bottom to tighten up burst on the first use. Otherwise a decent buy.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise a great product. Kept me warm
customer_reviews.text: Pocket zippers are cheap and one broke, but otherwise a great product. Kept me warm, did its job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and warm
customer_reviews.text: Slightly big, wish it had more a taper towards the bottom it feels like I’m wearing a cloak sometimes
customer_reviews.author: McGlone24

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy coat
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect coat for my 13 year old son. I ordered a medium it is a little big but it leaves room for growth. The inside of the coat is so soft and comfortable. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Tate

customer_reviews.title: Too Large for me
customer_reviews.text: I took the measurement with a tape, however it was large. Very Warm and Quality Materials,
customer_reviews.author: Paulo L.

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket for 1/3 the price of the name brand.
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket for 1/3 the price of the name brand. Runs slightly large.
customer_reviews.author: James Vargas

customer_reviews.title: great coat
customer_reviews.text: great coat looks good and keeps me nice and warm
customer_reviews.author: Justin Stone

customer_reviews.title: nice. perfect for the cold days that are to ...
customer_reviews.text: it's...nice. perfect for the cold days that are to come. thank you for making a warm and comforted jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Hernandez jr

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting a left handed zipper on a men’s coat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Furry
customer_reviews.text: Totally warm jacket. It’s like a polar bear hugging you while outside.
customer_reviews.author: Whiskery

customer_reviews.title: ... size as all my other jackets and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered same size as all my other jackets and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Jordan

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product for the money! I went on a ski trip and bought this coat just for that and could not have been happier!
customer_reviews.author: JMack056

customer_reviews.title: ... fake front pocket the jacket was really warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Besides the odd fake front pocket the jacket was really warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket, sizing chart off.
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket but the 9XL which according to their size chart was the same as 2XL was way to big. Ill reorder for a size or two smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Zipper separated from coat after a month of wear. Poor quality, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 4X, the tag says 4X but it fit as a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly well and it kept him warm during our trip!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: The is a difference between a mens and a boys size. I ordered a Mens 3x and the jackect look more like a 3X for a boy.
customer_reviews.author: Harold R.

customer_reviews.title: For the price, this jacket is a steal
customer_reviews.text: I don't typically write reviews, but felt compelled to do so for this jacket. It's great quality, very comfortable, and super warm. I've taken it snowboarding a few times and it was comparable to my friends' jackets, all of whom paid a lot more for theirs. At $45, this one is an absolute steal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a decent coat for the price
customer_reviews.text: 6'2 175lbs ordered a 5xl and it fits properly if not a little large. Seems like a decent coat for the price. I'll update the review after I've gone out in it.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The jacket itself was very nice and warm. However the jacket itself was too small.
customer_reviews.author: Ess M.

customer_reviews.title: Very warm, great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this jacket for my husband for a ski trip, I was really worried because there was no review for this one, I decided to risk and buy, based on the chart I purchased 4XL ( my husband size is M) I could've gone for one number smaller to fit perfectly. But still pretty good. Very well made Very very warm, I do recommend this jacket! The price is very worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Magda P

customer_reviews.title: Warmth  and look cool
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves fit and color He looks cool hes 12
customer_reviews.author: Judith Wiersema

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket, bad quality control
customer_reviews.text: The jacket itself is nice, size chart is off as noted so I compinsated for it when ordering. The issue I have is he waterproof zipper/pocket on the upper left chest is stiched together so it is useless...
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Stuck
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this is a nice comfy jacket. However, its way too big for me, never used it, but I held on to it for too long, therefore I was past my return time grace period, I guess. My biggest issue it's not that it's too big, i would still sport it, however, it's just not practical, some pockets are just for show, the quality of stitching is not the greatest, it looks that it wouldn't last very long. Regardless, i guess I'm stuck with a huge jacket that I won't wear. I might as well just sell it on Craigslist.
customer_reviews.author: DDD

customer_reviews.title: To Large
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this coat, but it was way to large for my taste. I prefer a slimmer winter coat.
customer_reviews.author: T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son he loved it and fits great and warm without being to heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Henry

product_meta.title: 4HOW Mens Water Resistant Ski Jacket Hooded Outdoor Fleece Coat
feature_bullets: Breathable, water resistant & windproof shell: 100% high quality polyester exterior with mesh lining balances air-permeability with weather-resistant protection, keeping you protected from moisture and light rain while maintaining breathable comfort
Lighweight & durable: Our mountain outdoor jacket offers durability and abrasion-resistance, and moves with you and layers easily

Adjustable design for custom fit & seal out the elements: Adjustable cuffs, hood and hem for a great fit. Detachable hood is adjustable with elastic draw cords; the hook and loop wrist adjustments seal the wrists; easy adjustment at the hem keeps jacket in place

Multi pockets for secure storage: 2 zippered side hand warmer pockets, 2 inner pockets which can provide secure storage and quick access to essentials and 1 chest pocket(this one is for decoration ONLY)
Stylish & Versatile: Stylish and sleek enough to wear to the office or out on the town, great for hiking, mountaineering, climbing, casual, or just simply rainy dog walks
